plot: This is an expository look into the life of a young man, Cesar Rodriguez, who was diagnosed with autism and has learned to live his life to the fullest despite his disabilities.
title: A Life in Focus
plot_es: This is an expository look into the life of a young man, Cesar Rodriguez, who was diagnosed with autism and has learned to live his life to the fullest despite his disabilities.
plot_en: This is an expository look into the life of a young man, Cesar Rodriguez, who was diagnosed with autism and has learned to live his life to the fullest despite his disabilities.
